masterProduct

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier. This is a big ugly number and is generally not displayed.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
partNumber  Help
The unique part number shared by all versions of the product.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
active  Help
Products cannot be deleted from the system, but they can be deactivated. Once set to inactive, the product will no longer be available for sale. Also, the product will be hidden from most configuration screens. Inactive products are still included in historical reports.
  		boolean required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion
